document_data.name: Antar
document_data.mainbody: '''Tlassian Antar Ludovic''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Tymanther]] and a member of [[Clan Tlassian]] in [[1479 DR]]. He was a renowned master [[armor]]er and weaponsmith.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|8}}
document_data.History: Antar was the chief smith of Clan Tlassian in 1479 DR. In his youth, he was trained by a renowned [[dwarf]] master smith known as [[Kvelic Forkbeard]]. Antar was the only non-dwarf who was recognized as a master smith by Kvelic. His armors were so coveted across [[Faer√ªn]], that even dwarf smiths, including Kvelic's other students, went to [[Djerad Thymar]] to buy them.
